channel.title: After 3 npc's down... (rest inside)
channel.description: Yea, instead of download a source with PC i have to re-create my own because i re-did my server back to a basic, so alot of stuff was changed. I have done alot of it back, but it went from 20 people max, to 500. So it runs alot better. I just need a simple base code thats not delta, that will say. When all 4 portals are down, to teleport everybody out and back to the PC base camp.

item.title: After 3 npc's down... (rest inside)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Envion:

if(portalCount <= 0) SomeClass.someTeleportMethod(somePlayerObject.getID(), docksx, docksy);

Hmm, i have no idea how to make a dead portal make the portal count go down. Stuff like this in my server is just confusing when i get the “Someclass” and “someteleportmethod” stuff, because that says its from a weird one, and wont work even with conversions.

Read full topic
